p: Blood was also collected from 20 healthy subjects from endemic and non-endemic regions in Brazil. None of the subjects showed symptoms of viral infection, and they tested negative for CHIKV, Zika and Dengue RNA. Serodiagnostic ELISAs were also performed to detect the presence of IgG antibodies specific to the Zika and/or Dengue viruses ( Fig 1b, S1 Table). IgG antibodies specific to CHIKV were detected in only one subject.
